root.sum: SumaryButton "дешевле" does not sort within the previously found product group
root.descript:
Description Preconditions Launch Google Chrom Go to Open URL https://prom.ua
Steps to reproduce 1. put in Search line "велосипед" 2. choose "велосипед" on the side panel 3. in the upper left corner click button "дешевле"
Actual result Any bicycle is not presented оn the page
Attachments"" Expected result Sort all bike from cheapest to most expensive
